actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: A bill to amend section 1102 of title 11, United States Code, to permit governmental units to participate as members of committees of creditors and of equity security holders on chapter 11 proceedings.

summary.text: Amends Federal bankruptcy law to permit a governmental unit with certain claims to be deemed a person eligible to be appointed to a committee of creditors or of equity security holders.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1102 of title 11, United States Code, to permit governmental units to participate as members of committees of creditors and of equity security holders on chapter 11 proceedings.
